title: Just smile and shine
creator_credit: Anna Huynh, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Anna Huynh tells of how she learned the hard way the pitfalls of trying to fit in. Looking different to everyone else, she tried doing everything her peers were doing and it took her further away from herself. In being true to herself, she discovered the true friendship and, ultimately, her true self.
